text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: An extension to provide the method that the care professional used to diagnose the condition, such as history taking only, history taking and physical examination, additional diagnostic examination or information from other care professionals.

purpose.value: This extension represents the MethodOfConfirmation concept of the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) DiagnosticInsight v1.0 (2024)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/DiagnosticInsight-v1.0(2024EN)).

copyright.value: Copyright and related rights waived via CC0, https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/. This does not apply to information from third parties, for example a medical terminology system. The implementer alone is responsible for identifying and obtaining any necessary licenses or authorizations to utilize third party IP in connection with the specification or otherwise.

definition.value: The method that the care professional used to diagnose the condition, such as history taking only, history taking and physical examination, additional diagnostic examination or information from other care professionals.
